ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry, can t help.  I foresaw this possibility when I started, and kept all my combat skills maxed as I went.  I ve been neglecting throwing and
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 18 Jun 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Bad news is you won't gain points fast until you begin to approach your max.
> It appears that only sucesses or near sucesses gain you skill points from
> what I've observed. John or JM correct me if I'm wrong, but I saw my skill
> in 1HB slowly gain till it was within 15 points or so of max, then shoot
> right up to max in no time, all the while fighting the same critters at the
> same level.

Sorry, can't help. I foresaw this possibility when I started,
and kept all my combat skills maxed as I went. I've been
neglecting throwing and hand-to-hand lately though. Hope they
aren't useful later... :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
